title: Would You Tell The World The Truth About UFOs? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/6/18
itunes:title: Would You Tell The World The Truth About UFOs? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/6/18
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and UFO researcher Richard Dolan debate the possibility of an average citizen revealing evidence of UFOs to the world even if it put their life in danger.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
